channel.title: Persistent homology on Nathaniel Saul | Around About
channel.description: Recent content in Persistent homology on Nathaniel Saul | Around About

item.title: Introduction to persistent homology
item.description: Intuitive explanation of holes in a dataset. how homology captures those holes. computing the holes in a simplicial complex ideas of persistence - most persistent holes as we grow the simplicial complex how to interpret persistence diagrams. Focus on how to use Ideally, all you’ll need in some intuition about what homology is if you want to use the libraries. We’re trying to make them very accessible to the general data science community, not just algebraic topology researchers.
